C

canMergeWith(ItemStack) - Method in class com.ikalagaming.entity.InventorySlot
Returns true if the other stack can stack with this item type, and this stack has enough space to accommodate the other stack.
canStackWith(Item) - Method in class com.ikalagaming.item.Item
Returns true if the two items can stack together.
canUse(Entity) - Method in interface com.ikalagaming.entity.powers.ICaster
Returns true if the given entity is (currently) able to use this ability.
clone() - Method in class com.ikalagaming.item.ItemStack
Returns a new ItemStack with the same item and size as this one.
com.ikalagaming.core - package com.ikalagaming.core
The heart of the game engine.
com.ikalagaming.entity - package com.ikalagaming.entity
Classes relating to entities, which are objects in a game.
com.ikalagaming.entity.component - package com.ikalagaming.entity.component
Individual parts of an entity that define what it is and what it can do.
com.ikalagaming.entity.effects - package com.ikalagaming.entity.effects
Relate to effects that can be applied to an entity.
com.ikalagaming.entity.events - package com.ikalagaming.entity.events
Events dispatched relating to effects.
com.ikalagaming.entity.powers - package com.ikalagaming.entity.powers
Relate to powers that an entity may use.
com.ikalagaming.item - package com.ikalagaming.item
Classes defining items that can be held by entities and how item storage behaves.
com.ikalagaming.server - package com.ikalagaming.server
The code that controls a game server.
com.ikalagaming.server.events - package com.ikalagaming.server.events
Events dispatched by the Server Controller.
com.ikalagaming.world - package com.ikalagaming.world
Structures for storing and interacting with in-game worlds.
combineItemStacks(ItemStack) - Method in class com.ikalagaming.entity.InventorySlot
Try to combine this item stack with another.
Component - Class in com.ikalagaming.entity.component
A useful part of an entity.

components - Variable in class com.ikalagaming.entity.Entity
 
CostList - Class in com.ikalagaming.entity.powers
A list of CostPairs and some helper methods for determining info about the list.
CostList(CostPair...) - Constructor for class com.ikalagaming.entity.powers.CostList
A list of costs that are needed for a power.
CostPair - Class in com.ikalagaming.entity.powers
A resource, and how much of that resource, that is needed to use a power.
CostPair(int, Resource) - Constructor for class com.ikalagaming.entity.powers.CostPair
Constructs a cost structure given an amount and the associated resource.
